text: @PhilaHsgAuthPHA I'm extremely irritated with the Housing picking procedure. I haven't heard anything from yall and been on the list forever. I have a 12 year old disabled son and 1 year old daughter. Still leaving at my mom spot. and need to get out of here. Who can I talk to??
text_html: @PhilaHsgAuthPHA I'm extremely irritated with the Housing picking procedure. I haven't heard anything from yall and been on the list forever. I have a 12 year old disabled son and 1 year old daughter. Still leaving at my mom spot. and need to get out of here. Who can I talk to??

text: Today I joined @HUDgov @SecretaryCarson & @PhilaHsgAuthPHA for a roundtable, tour, & announcement about our FFS program.  We heard from sev residents that graduated to home/business owners. It's as important to invest in our residents as well as buildings #HUDR3pic.twitter.com/6YIyVDqb9p

text: The Board Room on the 1st floor of the new PHA HQ building is named in honor of former Commissioners Jannie Blackwell & Nellie Reynolds (3rd & 4th from L) for their long service to PHA. pic.twitter.com/sjvfFJf4Up
text_html: The Board Room on the 1st floor of the new PHA HQ building is named in honor of former Commissioners Jannie Blackwell & Nellie Reynolds (3rd & 4th from L) for their long service to PHA. pic.twitter.com/sjvfFJf4Up

text: PHA formally dedicated its new HQ at 2013 Ridge Avenue. The building is part of a multi-phased, mixed use development under the Sharswood/Blumberg Transformation Plan. PHA has consolidated a number of offices and functions from across the city at this location. pic.twitter.com/YgCh1XTYwg
text_html: PHA formally dedicated its new HQ at 2013 Ridge Avenue. The building is part of a multi-phased, mixed use development under the Sharswood/Blumberg Transformation Plan. PHA has consolidated a number of offices and functions from across the city at this location. pic.twitter.com/YgCh1XTYwg
